attributes.action: allow arnel cabrera and direct family to remain in britain if they so desire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petetion is to overturn and allow arnel and family to remain in britain after a the results of a tragic hospital error resulting in the death of his wife. this county should accept responsibility for this accident and show a great deal more compassion.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
